name: WeightPreconditionReferenceSet
title: Weight precondition reference set
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Weight precondition value set as defined by the Clinical Information Modeling Initiative.),(Data Element Scope: Weight precondition values are used when the patient has something attached to their body, such as a cast, prosthesis, or oxygen that may change the patients weight prior to the weight measurement, resulting the SNOMED CT concept: Weight precondition reference set (foundation metadata concept) 23931000205106.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set is missing 5 concepts from the HSPC extension namespace: Dry weight (finding) 23981000205105; Not wearing prosthetic device (finding) 23971000205108; Wearing cast or brace (finding) 23951000205103;  Wearing oxygen equipment (finding) 23941000205101; Wearing prosthetic device (finding) 23961000205100;),(Exclusion Criteria: )
